name: DvD (Cybo3D)
description:
The dvd bouncing screen in game format. made for the Clicker Jam Spring 2023.

features: a nostalgic game watching the dvd bounce and maybe even go into the corner, upgrade your speed and add more logo's bouncing or buy more colors.

this game was made in 10 days.

Music by Marc Panicello (kraminap): SoundCloud
